name: Untold: Red Tide
description:
An immersive text-based RPG by the creators of Untold RPG.

Warships on the horizon. And the world will never be the same.
Long ago, you were trained to kill. Your blade was forged to uphold the law.
Life as a soldier was never easy. The guardsmen of great cities are bound to witness the worst side of civilized society. Yet nothing compares to the atrocities of all-out war.
Never did you imagine that the place where you were born would burn to ash.
But such is reality. And now you sleep in the infirmary, haunted by nightmares of blood and steel.
They thought you would never wake up. And perhaps you never will.
So many questions. What kind of world will you see when your eyes are open?
Is your brother still alive? And what about your sister?
Only one way to find out.
